com.mapdigit.gis.service
Interface IDirectionQuery

public interface IDirectionQuery

This class is used to query driving directions.

© Copyright 2009 Guidebee Pty Ltd.

Method Summary

          This method issues a new directions query.

Method Detail

getDirection

void getDirection(GeoLatLng[] waypoints,
                  IRoutingListener listener)
This method issues a new directions query. The query parameter is a string containing any valid directions query,

Parameters:
waypoints - the directions query string
listener - the routing listener.

getDirection

void getDirection(java.lang.String query,
                  IRoutingListener listener)
Deprecated. use getDirection(GeoLatLng[] waypoints, IRoutingListener listener).

This method issues a new directions query. The query parameter is a string containing any valid directions query, e.g. "from: Seattle to: San Francisco" or "from: Toronto to: Ottawa to: New York". or the longitude,latitude list depends on which map server.

Parameters:
query - the directions query string
listener - the routing listener.

getDirection

void getDirection(int mapType,
                  java.lang.String query,
                  IRoutingListener listener)
This method issues a new directions query. The query parameter is a string containing any valid directions query, e.g. "from: Seattle to: San Francisco" or "from: Toronto to: Ottawa to: New York".

Parameters:
mapType - the map type.
query - the directions query string
listener - the routing listener.
